name: AngelShooter
description:
《AngelShooter》 is a high difficulty bitmap horizontal-scroll shooting game.

There are 6 different levels in the game.
You will control the angels to pursue the witch's footprint who destroyed the world, all the way to defeat all kinds of enemies and finally the witch.

. The original "score bonus" system makes the game strategic, and you will be able to decide when to get the item by yourself.
. Not just the barrage! The enemy will also cast special attacks on you!
. In addition to the enemies, traps and terrains will also test your control.
